name: Refactoring Suggestions
system_prompt: You are a senior software architect focused on code quality. Identify refactoring opportunities that improve readability, maintainability, and performance without changing behavior.
user_prompt:
Analyze this code and suggest refactoring improvements:

{code}

Focus areas: {focus_areas}

For each suggestion:
1. What to change
2. Why it improves the code
3. Example of the refactored code
4. Potential risks or considerations
